description: {"blocks":[{"key":"f3tcg","text":"2X PCR Master Mixes are convenient to use as they include all the necessary PCR components except the template and primers. Most PCR Master Mixes also include agarose gel running dyes and a density reagent that allows direct loading of PCR products on an agarose gel for electrophoresis. The master mix format simplifies workflows and sample handling; simply add primers, template, and water and then begin PCR. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
guidelines: {"blocks":[{"key":"dl04q","text":"Storage: -20℃ for long-term storage. 4℃ for short-term storage (up to 3 months). (Note) If used frequently, store at 4℃ ; the activity of the Master Mix may decrease with repeated freezing and thawing. Gently mix well before use and centrifuge briefly.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":8}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7vg1r","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fou58","text":"Application: ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":12}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ai06r","text":"・DNA amplification by PCR ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"e2unh","text":"・Colony PCR","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"al4l5","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"f29e9","text":"PCR Products: Since most PCR products amplified Taq PCR Master Mix have an A overhang added at 3’-termini, the obtained PCR product can be used directly for cloning into a TA cloning vector. Additionally, it is possible to clone the product in a blunt-end vector after blunting and phosphorylation. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":13}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1oe87","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"b06k3","text":"Dye Migration during Electrophoresis: Check individual manufacturers information on the migration of the included running dyes.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":38}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

status.info: We are still developing and optimizing this protocol

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"2u5sb","text":"To a   aliquot of a 2X Taq PCR Master Mix (e.g. TaqDog, or Sapphire Amp), add template (10-20 µl cleared lysate for colony PCR or    of purified DNA for typical PCR), forward and reverse primers to a final concentration of  . Adjust final volume to   with nuclease free water or autoclaved water.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":5,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":131,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":223,"length":1},{"key":3,"offset":249,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"cmab2","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5cd7l","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"84d93","text":"
